alert.note: Alert for Clay; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 5:57PM MDT until July 21 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL CLAY AND SOUTHEASTERN YANKTON COUNTIES... At 657 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located just west of Volin, or 9 miles east of Yankton, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Clay and southeastern Yankton Counties, including the following locations... Gayville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
